name: The Marmot
description:
Based on Beethoven's song La Marmotte.

You are little beggar with Barrel organ and marmot, walking by the streets of small town in a search of better future.

Made for Kolenka "HARD TIMES" jam.

Controls:

Arrows - walking

Z - play song about marmot

X - take money from the hat to the pocket

Play at least for 4 ingame days for the full experience.
